Sentencas: The concept of anode-supported planar solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) involves different fabrication procedures and several sintering steps.
Titulo: Simplified processing of anode-supported thin film planar solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: This contribution is an attempt towards minimizing the number of sintering steps.
Titulo: Simplified processing of anode-supported thin film planar solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: By adopting an improved technique a pre-firing step was eliminated.
Titulo: Simplified processing of anode-supported thin film planar solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Cells obtained following this co-firing technique showed relatively higher power density (similar to1 A cm(-2) at 0.7 V) at an operating temperature of 800degreesC compared to the cells prepared by the conventional technique.
Titulo: Simplified processing of anode-supported thin film planar solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In the present investigation, cells as large as10 cm x 10 cm were prepared and characterized following the new co-firing approach.
Titulo: Simplified processing of anode-supported thin film planar solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Detailed microstructural, leak-rate testing (gastightness of the sintered electrolyte film) and electrochemical characterizations were carried out.
Titulo: Simplified processing of anode-supported thin film planar solid oxide fuel cells
